articles.title: Maker leads Australia past Tall Blacks in Asia Cup semi - 1News
articles.description: The Tall Blacks came within two of the Boomers with just three minutes remaining before Thon Maker hit a clutch three-pointer to help seal the deal.
articles.content:
Boomers centre Thon Maker produced another powerful performance to lead Australia to a 85-76 FIBA Asia Cup basketball semi-final win over the Tall Blacks.
Thon Maker was a driving force in leading A… [+1476 chars]

articles.title: 'Department stores are closing one by one, it's so sad': Shoppers throng OG's Orchard Point outlet - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Queues formed outside the entrances of department store OG at Orchard Point on Friday morning (July 22), the day after the retailer announced it would be shutting the outlet in October. There were around 50 people each at the store’s two main entr…

articles.title: Mediacorp actress Xiang Yun hopes to raise awareness on dementia and schizophrenia - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: “People with dementia and schizophrenia aren't always in a state of instability – there are times when they are alright and sweet.”
articles.content: You won't find actress Xiang Yun on the poster of Mediacorps new drama Your World In Mine but playing the role of Wang Jinhui, a mother of two who is plagued by schizophrenia and dementia, is possibl… [+2152 chars]

articles.title: Taiwanese singer Jimmy Lin injured after his Tesla crashes; car burst into flames - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Taiwanese singer Jimmy Lin was injured on Friday (Jul 22) after his Tesla car crashed into an electrical pole at a road divider in Taiwan's Taoyuan City. The car also burst into flames. According to a post on his official Facebook page, the 47-year-old Lin wa…
